title: Kiewa catchment farm tree group: a community in action
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Agriculture and Rural Affairs. North Central Media Unit, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Tourist trade - Environmental aspects
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental protection - Citizen participation
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Tourist trade - Environmental aspects

description: The Kiewa community formed a tree planting group to combat the problems of land degradation due to the impact of agricultural practices, the effect of tourisism in the area and erosion. This video shows how a small community in the alpine area of north-east Victoria, worked together to deal with an environmental problem.
